Welcome to Polarion

This is the Home page for your Polarion portal. It contains information and links that can be useful for users of the portal.

TIPS FOR GETTING STARTED

This is the top-level Home page for your Polarion portal. You can customize it, replacing the default content with your own to create a useful resource for users of this portal. This is a good place to provide information for new users, as well as general information for all portal users. Among the many possible things you might do:

  • Present overviews and key contacts of your organization and teams
  • Provide documentation of your technical resources and standards
  • Publish guidelines
  • Provide links to portal resources, including team or business unit spaces and/or Home pages

The list of possibilities is endless. Do some thinking about what kind of general content should be provided for portal users, and begin creating the Pages you need. When you're ready to work on this Page, click Expand Tools above, then click the Edit button. You can replace this text and provide your own in the same region. You can create other regions and add text, images and Widgets to them. The catalog of visually configurable "Widgets" enables you to easily display a wide variety of information about the projects and activity happening on the portal. See Help on how to work with Pages.

Once again, welcome… and thanks for using Polarion!

Polarion Extensions Portal 
Easily extend the out-of-box functionality of Polarion solutions. Custom-configured project templates, connectivity with popular tools and apps, information import/export… you'll find all of these and more on the Polarion Extensions Portal.
